SELECT T1.PRTNR_NO , T5.OG_CD , T5.PRTNR_KNM , T2.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , T2.BASE_PD_CD /*상품코드*/ , T3.PD_NM /*상품명*/ , BAS.SV_FEE_PD_DV_CD /*BS상품군*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_FEE_PD_DV_CD', BAS.SV_FEE_PD_DV_CD) AS SV_FEE_PD_DV_NM /*BS상품군*/ , NVL(BAS.SV_FEE_BASE_AMT, 0) AS SV_FEE_BASE_AMT /*BS기본수수료*/ , NVL(T2.FEE_CALC_AMT, 0) AS FEE_CALC_AMT /*방문수수료*/ , T2.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD /*작업유형코드*/ , T2.VST_RGLVL_GD_CD /*방문급지*/ , CASE T2.VST_RGLVL_GD_CD WHEN '1' THEN CASE T5.OG_TP_CD WHEN 'W02' THEN 'N' ELSE 'A' END WHEN '2' THEN CASE T5.OG_TP_CD WHEN 'W02' THEN 'G' ELSE 'B' END WHEN '3' THEN CASE T5.OG_TP_CD WHEN 'W02' THEN 'W1' ELSE 'C' END WHEN '4' THEN CASE T5.OG_TP_CD WHEN 'W02' THEN 'W2' ELSE 'D' END WHEN '5' THEN 'W3' WHEN '6' THEN 'S1' WHEN '7' THEN 'S2' ELSE '*' END AS VST_RGLVL_GD_NM /*방문급지*/ , CASE T2.FILT_SELL_TP_CD WHEN '1' THEN ' 할부' WHEN '2' THEN ' 렌탈' WHEN '3' THEN ' 멤버십' WHEN '4' THEN ' 회사' ELSE ' ****' END AS SELL_TP_NM /*판매구분*/ , T2.PD_USWY_CD || '-' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'PD_USWY_CD', T2.PD_USWY_CD) AS USWY_NM /*용도구분*/ , CASE WHEN T2.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2240' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS PRR_VST_YN /*사전방문여부*/ , T2.VST_DUEDT /*방문예정일자*/ , T2.WK_EXCN_DT /*방문일자*/ , CASE WHEN T2.VST_TP_DV_CD = '2' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CAN_YN /*취소여부*/ FROM /*2023.08.04 BS실적집계가 되어야 조회 가능하도록 수정*/ ( SELECT A.BASE_YM , A.CL_DV_CD , A.OG_TP_CD , A.PRTNR_NO , A.PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD FROM TB_FEAM_WPTN_SV_PERF_AGRG A /*웰스파트너서비스실적집계*/ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_NTORP_PERF_MM_CL B /*순주문파트너실적월마감*/ ON A.BASE_YM = B.BASE_YM AND A.BASE_YM = B.PERF_YM AND A.CL_DV_CD = B.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD AND A.OG_TP_CD = B.OG_TP_CD AND A.PRTNR_NO = B.PRTNR_NO AND B.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B.PERF_DV_CD = '0' AND B.PERF_ATC_CD IN ('W02P00085', 'W02P00095') WHERE A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) T1 /*BS실적집계*/ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_WELS_SV_PERF_IZ T2 /*웰스서비스실적내역*/ ON T1.BASE_YM = T2.BASE_YM AND T1.CL_DV_CD = T2.CL_DV_CD AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T3 ON T2.BASE_PD_CD = T3.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T4 /*계약상세*/ ON T2.CNTR_NO = T4.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T4.CNTR_SN AND T4.SELL_TP_CD IN ('1', '2', '3', '6') /*판매유형코드-일시불,렌탈,멤버십,정기배송*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T5 /* 월파트너내역 */ ON T2.BASE_YM = T5.BASE_YM AND T2.OG_TP_CD = T5.OG_TP_CD AND T2.PRTNR_NO = T5.PRTNR_NO AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT SV_FEE_BASE_AMT /*BS기본수수료*/ , SV_FEE_PD_DV_CD /*BS상품그룹*/ FROM TB_FEAM_WELS_SV_FEE_BAS C /*웰스서비스수수료기본*/ WHERE BASE_PD_CD = T2.BASE_PD_CD AND VST_MCN = 0 AND SV_FEE_DV_CD = CASE WHEN T5.OG_TP_CD = 'W03' THEN '2' ELSE '1' END AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN APY_STRT_YM AND APY_END_YM ORDER BY BASE_PD_CD , VST_MCN , SV_FEE_DV_CD , HCR_DV_CD, BASE_CH_TCNT ) BAS ON 1=1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND T1.CL_DV_CD = #{feeTcntDvCd} AND T1.OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} AND (T2.WK_EXCN_DT IS NOT NULL AND T2.WK_EXCN_DT != '0') /*작업수행일자*/
AND T2.BASE_PD_CD >= #{strtPdCd} /*상품코드*/
AND T2.BASE_PD_CD <= #{endPdCd} /*상품코드*/
AND T2.WK_EXCN_DT BETWEEN #{strtVstDt} AND #{endVstDt} /*방문일자*/
AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo}
